Literature.Title: Engineering Enhanced Antimicrobial Properties in α-Conotoxin RgIA through D-Type Amino Acid Substitution and Incorporation of Lysine and Leucine Residues.
Literature.Author: Wang M, Liao Z, Zhangsun D, Wu Y, Luo S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=128 µM,Human hepatocyte cells THLE-3:50% Cytotoxicity=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida tropicalis BNCC 340288(MIC=8µM),Candida parapsilosis BNCC 336015(MIC=8µM),Bacillus subtilis BNCC 109047 (MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli BNCC 336902(MIC=128µM)
